item.Q:
Write the character:
picture; image; reflection; shadow
item.A:
yǐng
影响 (影響) yǐngxiǎng an influence; to influence; to affect (usually adversely); to disturb

item.Q:
Write the character:
sound; voice; (a measure word, used for sounds); tone; noise
item.A:
traditional: 聲
shēng
声音 (聲音) shēngyīn voice; sound

item.Q:
Write the character:
flat; level; equal; to tie (make the same score); to draw (score); calm; peaceful; level or even tone (i.e. first and second tones in classical Chinese); surname
item.A:
píng
和平 hépíng peace

item.Q:
Write the character:
(classifier for vehicles or machines); platform; stage; terrace; stand; support; desk; station; broadcasting station; Taiwan (abbr.)
item.A:
traditional: 臺
tái

traditional: 員
yuán
委员 (委員) wěiyuán committee member; committee; council

item.Q:
Write the character:
metal; money; gold; surname
item.A:
jīn
金属 (金屬) jīnshǔ metal

item.Q:
Write the character:
ask for; send punitive expedition; to demand; to marry
item.A:
traditional: 討
tǎo
讨论 (討論) tǎolùn to discuss; to talk over

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: color; look; appearance
2: color; dice
item.A:
1: sè 2: shǎi
颜色 (顏色) yánsè color 本色 běnshǎi natural color

item.Q:
Write the character:
(expresses contrast with a previous sentence or clause); standard; norm; rule; to imitate; to follow; then; principle
item.A:
则 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 則
zé
原则 (原則) yuánzé principle; doctrine

item.Q:
Write the character:
to hold; to contain; to allow; appearance; look; countenance
item.A:
róng
容易 róngyì easy; likely; liable (to)

item.Q:
Write the character:
official records; grade (of goods); file; records; shelves; cross-piece; (classifier for cross-pieces)
item.A:
档 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 檔
dàng
档案 (檔案) dàngàn file; record; archive

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: a slice; piece; flake; thin; slice; (classifier for movies, DVDs etc)
2: disc; sheet
item.A:
1: piàn 2: piān
一片 yīpiàn piece; slice 片子 piānzi film; movie

妳 (strokes unavailable)
nǐ

shì
城市 chéngshì city; town

item.Q:
Write the character:
advantage; benefit; profit; sharp
item.A:
lì
胜利 (勝利) shènglì victory

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: interest
2: flourish; it is the fashion to; to become popular
item.A:
traditional: 興
1: xìng 2: xīng
高兴 (高興) gāoxìng happy; glad; willing (to do sth); in a cheerful mood 兴奋 (興奮) xīngfèn excited; excitement

item.Q:
Write the character:
white; snowy; empty; blank; bright; clear; plain; pure; gratuitous; surname
item.A:
bái
蛋白质 (蛋白質) dànbáizhì protein

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: strong; powerful; better; slightly more than; vigorous; violent; surname
2: to strive; to make an effort
3: stubborn; unyielding
item.A:
traditional: 強
1: qiáng 2: qiǎng 3: jiàng
加强 (加強) jīaqiáng to reinforce; to strengthen; to increase 强迫 (強迫) qiǎngpò compel; force 倔强 (倔強) juéjiàng stubborn; obstinate; unbending

jīaqiáng to reinforce; to strengthen; to increase

nèiróng content; substance; details

traditional: 強度
qiángdù strength; intensity

ānquán safe; secure; safety; security

shēngyīn voice; sound
